+ Keyboard Shortcut Ctrl-Alt-B

Use [Ctrl-Alt-B] to add a WikiBookmark to a wiki page,
or select ["Navigate" menu]->"Add Bookmark".

WikiBookmarks are just a form of WikiDocumentAttribute.

++ See also

	* [Ctrl-Shift-B]
	* ["Navigate" menu]
	* KeyBindings


[:page:PageFooter][icon:key][alias:Ctrl-Alt-B][short_hint:Add Bookmark]
